description:
The all new ANBERNIC RG28XX is here and it’s an amazing little handheld retro gaming machine! With enough power to play dreamcast, N64, Atomiswave, DS and many many more! With a 2.8” screen this is the perfect size to travel with and packs a lot of power!

Buy it on Aliexpress: https://s.click.aliexpress.com/e/_DDtIHeJ

Learn More Here: https://anbernic.com?sca_ref=2193181.CeT6UNbFuN
